skills.description: Harlowe gains increased Splash Damage.

skills.name: Inertia
skills.description: Whenever an enemy Harlowe has in Stasis dies, a new enemy is automatically added to Stasis. When this happens, Harlowe's Action Skill Duration resets, however it drains quicker.

skills.name: Experimentation
skills.description: Kill Skill. Killing an Entangled enemy causes an Elemental Explosion on all other Entangled enemies.

skills.name: Domino Effect
skills.description: Whenever Harlowe deals Splash Damage to an Entangled enemy, she gains a chance to trigger Entangled Damage Share again.

skills.name: Sustained Reaction
skills.description: Kill Skill. Killing an Entangled enemy restores a portion of Harlowe's Action Skill Duration.

skills.name: Ground State
skills.description: Every time Harlowe Slams an enemy, gain increased Slam Damage and Slam Damage Radius. Enemies in Stasis take Decreased Damage. Press Action Skill to Slam all enemies in Stasis straight down.

skills.name: Gordian Knot
skills.description: Kill Skill. Whenever Harlowe kills an Entangled enemy, she gains a chance to instantly fully restore her Action Skill.

skills.name: Fuzzy Math
skills.description: Harlowe gains increased Status Effect Chance.

skills.name: Concentrated Build Up
skills.description: While Aiming with a Gun, Rafa deals Bonus Shock Damage. Each time Rafa deals Gun Damage to an enemy while Aiming, gain further increased Bonus Shock Damage until he stops Aiming.

actionSkills.name: Peacebreaker Cannons
actionSkills.description: Equip Rafa's Peacebreaker Cannons, which automatically fire at enemies in Rafa's crosshairs, dealing Kinetic Gun Damage. If that enemy dies or you press M3, the Peacebreaker Cannons find a new target. Holding F end Peacebreaker Cannons, and refunds a portion of the remaining Action Skill Duration as Action Skill Cooldown.

actionSkills.name: Arc-Knives
actionSkills.description: Rafa puts down his guns and equips his Arc-Knives, blades that deal Melee Damage and Mark Enemies whenever they damage them, causing them to take increased Damage for every Mark on them. M1: Perform Melee Attacks with Rafa's Arc-Knives. M2: Dash forward and perform a Shock Melee attack. F: Unleash Rafa's Blade Fury, which deals Shock Damage to all Marked enemies, and ends the Skill.

actionSkills.name: APOPHIS Lance
actionSkills.description: Equip Rafa's Apophis Lance, an offhand Arm Cannon that decreases Rafa's Gun Handling, but allows him to fire Piercing Shock Ordnance Blasts. Any unused Charges when Apophis Lance ends are converted into Action Skill Cooldown. Press M2 to fire a Piercing Shock Ordnance Blast at enemies and consume a Charge, or hold M2 to charge Rafa's Apophis Lance for increased Damage, Projectile Size, and Projectile Speed - at the cost of more Charges.

actionSkills.name: Phase Phamiliar
actionSkills.description: Vex is joined by her Minion, Trouble. When killed, Trouble will Respawn after a cooldown. Press F to teleport Trouble, dealing Damage in an area. Trouble then transforms into a Badass, fully restoring Health and gaining increased Damage for a Duration. Activating Phase Phamiliar will Respawn Trouble if currently dead.

actionSkills.name: Incarnate
actionSkills.description: Vex creates a Phase Explosion, dealing Damage to nearby enemies and fully restoring her Health. While active, Vex can use Eldrich Blast and gains increased Movement Speed. Eldrich Blast: Press F to fire an Eldrich Blast from her offhand, dealing Damage to nearby enemies on impact. Dealing Gun Damage reduces Eldrich Blast's Cooldown. Press and hold F to end Incarnate early, partially refunding Cooldown.

actionSkills.name: Dead Ringer
actionSkills.description: Charge Skill (3). Spawn a Phase Clone Minion, choosing a Specter or Reaper. Phase Clones lose an ever-increasing amount of Health per second, and their Damage Type matches Vex's current Attunement when spawned. Press M1 to Spawn a Reaper, that Taunts enemies and deals Melee Attack Damage. Press M2 to Spawn a Specter, that deals Gun Damage and cannot move.

actionSkills.name: Onslaughter
actionSkills.description: Amon overloads his Forgefist, gaining constant Shield Regeneration, Bonus Incendiary Damage with Guns, and increased Movement Speed. Press Action Skill or Melee to Rocket Punch, Dashing to target enemy, dealing Incendiary Melee Attack Damage in a short-ranged Cone, and causing Stagger. Bosses cannot be Staggered, and Badasses have a chance to be Staggered.

actionSkills.name: Scourge
actionSkills.description: Amon equips a Forgeshield that absorbs all frontal Damage as Vengeance. Whenever the Vengeance Meter is filled, Forgeshield provides Damage Reduction instead. Vengeance drains rapidly if it has not been gained recently. Press Action Skill to launch a Forgewave, dealing Cryo Ordnance Damage to enemies it passes through, consuming Vengeance to increase Damage Dealt.

actionSkills.name: Crucible
actionSkills.description: Charge Skill (3). Amon readies Forgeaxes that can be thrown and picked up off the ground to refund Cooldown. Can throw a Flame Axe, dealing Incendiary Melee Damage, or a Frost Axe, dealing Cryo Melee Damage. Enemies damaged by Forgeaxes are Primed for a Duration, and will Detonate when they die or are damaged by a Forgeskill dealing Damage to nearby enemies.

actionSkills.name: CHROMA Accelerator
actionSkills.description: Fire an Unstable Energy Pocket from Harlowe's CHROMA Accelerator. The Unstable Energy Pocket passes through enemies and deals Cryo Damage to all enemies it passes near. Pressing Action Skill causes the Unstable Energy Pocket to explode and deal heavy Radiation Damage in a large area.

actionSkills.name: Zero-Point
actionSkills.description: Press Action Skill to use Harlowe's HALO Accelerator to place an enemy in Stasis for a duration. Enemies immune to Stasis take Damage instead. Pressing Action Skill again causes the enemy in Stasis to be slammed into the ground in the direction Harlowe is facing, and creates a small explosion. Retriggering Stasis has a Cooldown.

actionSkills.name: Flux Generator
actionSkills.description: Harlowe throws her Flux Generator in front of her, which projects an Energy Field, dealing Cryo Damage over time and Entangling enemies. Allies inside the Energy Field gain Overshield. Press Action Skill to pick up your Flux Generator and toss it again.

specializations.name: Sturdy Stuff
specializations.description: Fight For Your Life lasts longer when not moving, and Second Winds fully restore the Vault Hunter's Health.

specializations.name: Bullets Are Scared Of Me
specializations.description: The Vault Hunter gains increased Damage Reduction based on the fullness of their Shield or Health, whichever has higher Maximum Capacity.

specializations.name: The Best Defense
specializations.description: The Vault Hunter gains increased Damage Dealt based on the fullness of their Shield or Health, whichever has higher Maximum Capacity.

specializations.name: Tripwire
specializations.description: Reduce Ordnance Cooldown whenever Action Skill is activated.

specializations.name: Full Spectrum Arsenal
specializations.description: Ordnance Damage now benefits from increases to Gun Damage.

specializations.name: Fragmentation Payload
specializations.description: Ordnance gains a chance to Critically Hit enemies, and also gains increased Ordnance Critical Hit Damage.

specializations.name: Lead or Alive
specializations.description: When entering Fight For Your Life, all Guns are automatically Reloaded, and the Vault Hunter gains increased Fire Rate.

specializations.name: CQC
specializations.description: Melee Damage grants the Vault Hunter increased Fire Rate for a Duration.

specializations.name: Riddle You This
specializations.description: Whenever the Vault Hunter deals Gun Damage, gain a Stack of Riddle You This, increasing Gun Damage. Stacks are lost if a new Stack has not been gained for a Duration.

specializations.name: Contamination
specializations.description: Critical Hits grant increased Status Effect Application Chance.

specializations.name: Compounding Afflictions
specializations.description: Enemies take increased Damage for each Status Effect applied to them.

specializations.name: Overkill
specializations.description: Kill Skill. Killing an enemy with a Critical Hit will cause them to explode, dealing Skill Damage.

specializations.name: Down But Not Out
specializations.description: During Fight For Your Life the Vault Hunter can now Aim down sights and does not suffer Gun Accuracy penalties.

specializations.name: In The Zone
specializations.description: While Aiming, the Vault Hunter gains increased Gun Damage and Critical Hit Damage per second. Bonuses are lost after 2 seconds of not Aiming.

specializations.name: One Shot, One Kill
specializations.description: Kill Skill. Excess Damage will be Stored and added to your next Gun Shot.

specializations.name: Now With Caffeine
specializations.description: Reduce Action Skill Cooldown whenever a Repkit is activated.

specializations.name: I Am A Gun
specializations.description: Action Skill Damage now benefits from increases to Gun Damage.

specializations.name: A Honed Mind
specializations.description: Action Skills gain a chance to Critically Hit enemies, and also gain increased Action Skill Critical Hit Damage.

specializations.name: Bear Arms
specializations.description: Melee Damage now benefits from increases to Gun Damage.

specializations.name: Bullet Train
specializations.description: The Vault Hunter can now Hipfire while Sprinting, and gain Gun Damage the faster they move.

specializations.name: Groundbreaker
specializations.description: Non-Melee Attack Damage and Slam Damage are Stored. Melee Attacks and Slam deal Bonus Kinetic Melee Damage based on Stored Damage, and consume it.

specializationBranches.name: Survivor
specializationBranches.description: The Vault Hunter gains increased Maximum Health and Shields.

specializationBranches.name: Gadgeteer
specializationBranches.description: The Vault Hunter gains increased Ordnance Cooldown Rate.

specializationBranches.name: Brute
specializationBranches.description: The Vault Hunter gains increased Gun Damage.

specializationBranches.name: Killer
specializationBranches.description: The Vault Hunter gains increased Critical Hit Damage and Status Effect Damage.

specializationBranches.name: Sharpshooter
specializationBranches.description: The Vault Hunter gains increased Reload Speed and Accuracy.

specializationBranches.name: Daredevil
specializationBranches.description: The Vault Hunter gains increased Action Skill Cooldown Rate.

specializationBranches.name: Runner
specializationBranches.description: The Vault Hunter gains increased Movement Speed and Melee Damage.
